Services we specialise in

Bhakti Yoga
A spiritual practice focused on loving devotion towards a personal deity
Pranayama
Focus on breathing with this yogic practice to gain control
Bikram Yoga
Also known as hot yoga, a type of exercise
Kundalini Yoga
Release the kundalini energy in this spiritual and physical practice
Iyengar Yoga
Yoga postures performed and practice with precision and emphasis on the detail
Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga
Following eight movements, a form of classical Indian yoga
Yin Yoga
Slow paced, and holding poses longer than other yoga styles
Jivamukti Yoga
A combination of vinyasa-based yoga and vigorous yoga as exercise
